headline.main: Pirates in Nigeria Release Russian, Ukrainian Sailors: Agencies
headline.print_headline: Pirates in Nigeria Release Russian, Ukrainian Sailors: Agencies

lead_paragraph: Nigerian pirates have released seven Russian and one Ukrainian sailors after they were captured last month on the cargo ship the BBC Caribbean, Russian news agencies reported on Sunday, citing a human rights activist in Crimea.
snippet: Nigerian pirates have released seven Russian and one Ukrainian sailors after they were captured last month on the cargo ship the BBC Caribbean, Russian news agencies reported on Sunday, citing a human rights activist in Crimea....
